h1_38: McGaw Medical Center of Northwestern University Program
h3_39: McGaw Medical Center of Northwestern University
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_79: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_97: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_100: Our residents participate in a variety of specialty clinics (ie, skin of color, pigmented lesion, psoriasis, collagen vascular disorders, mucosal disorders, lymphoma, and dermatologic oncology). A wealth of research and leadership opportunities are available; we offer specialized certificate programs in global health & medical education. We are excited to train our residents to be successful dermatologists, academicians and leaders in the field.

p_353: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
